advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: Minor fixes and improvements to maintain optimal performance
description:
Voice effects, scrolling lyrics, and more available as you sing over 10 million of your favourite songs! Have fun recording and add professional audio effects to your songs and sound amazing!     
     
Karaoke songs and singing with friends are just a few taps away when you join members of Smule’s collaborative singing community or sing alongside recordings of popular music celebrities. With millions of songs to choose from, you’re sure to find your favourite hit record, as well as the latest trending music! Smule is fun for everyone who enjoys singing - all skill levels welcome!

Create music any way you like! Practice & sing karaoke free of distractions in private or share music by collaborating with singers on Smule. Learn to sing songs with Smule as your vocal coach!      Improve your voice with an on-screen pitch guide and tutorials. Smule’s music app is the pitch perfect place to share your love of singing with music lovers like you. 

Join Smule to make music duets and sing songs with friends & people from around the globe with our free Sing Live feature.

FEATURES
• Explore a song collection of over 10+ million of your favourite karaoke tunes w/ scrolling lyrics!
• Sing acapella or hop into karaoke solo, in a duet, or group     
• Make music with studio-quality audio and voice effects to help you sound amazing
• Host or join a live karaoke party! Sing LIVE w/ audio 24/7 with friends & music lovers around the world
• Hit record and sing with your camera off for audio-only performances or turn it on & get creative with fun video effects & filters
• Record music side-by-side in a duet with top music artists like Dua Lipa, Olivia Rodrigo, Anne-Marieh Ed Sheeran, Disney characters, & more
• Your Smule profile lets you privately save your recordings or share with the Smule community
• Share your vocal performances to TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, WhatsApp & more
• Music video tools are at your disposal! Record audio & vocals first & then add your own original video
• Create music in Freestyle: Use Smule as your own music making app to create an original song & invite others to join you
• Join in new Smule challenges & contests every month to win prizes & get noticed
• Record music messages personalised for family & friends!
• Vocal coach features available to help you learn to sing with an on-screen pitch guide & singing tutorials
• Join a duet & sing just your favourite part of the song, like the chorus or verse, with ‘Moments’
• A singing app that does it all. Smule lets you record yourself voice acting scenes from movies, musicals & more

LET'S MUSIC TOGETHER™

Sing Pop, R&B, Rock, Rap, Hip-Hop, Country, K-pop, & more! With new songs added daily, you’ll find your favourite songs & karaoke hits. Can’t find your karaoke song? Upload songs & trending music to the Songbook: https://www.smule.com/support/upload#songbook

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC™

Music is about more than just listening — it's about creating, sharing, discovering, participating, & connecting. It’s the original social network with the power to break down barriers & bring people together. Join our global community & express yourself as the next Smule music maker.

Create music & even record your own choreography while you sing. Connect with Facebook to make music with friends! Integrate your singing journey with your social media.

FIND YOUR VOICE

Singing is for everyone on Smule. Use music voice effects & video filters to smooth over imperfections.

If you love karaoke, like to sing along to radio songs, dream of singing a duet with pop stars, or simply love music—try Smule free now!
